label: LoRaWAN REST
info:
Flow in charge of handling the HTTP REST requests fowarded by the LoRa Server.
It will transform the messages to the correspondent json-schema.

label: LoRaWAN MQTT
info:
Flow in charge of handling the MQTT messages fowarded by the LoRa Server.
It will transform the messages to the correspondent json-schema.

name: Alerts

name: Summary Query Building
template:
select device,device_type, 
	data::json->'uv'::text as uv,
	data::json->'light'::text as light,
	data::json->'sm'::text as sm,
	data::json->'rain'::text as rain,
	data::json->'pressure'::text as pressure,
	data::json->'humidity'::text as humidity,
	data::json->>'temperature'::text as temperature,
	to_char(to_timestamp(gw_time/ 1000),'DD/MM/YYYY') as data_time
from telemetry
	where gw_time>$timestamp

name: Prepare summary
Process Summary
Prepare Summaries
Prepare Telemetry
Telemetry Query Building
template:
select device,device_type, 
	data::json->>'uv'::text as uv,
	data::json->>'light'::text as light,
	data::json->>'sm'::text as sm,
	data::json->>'rain'::text as rain,
	data::json->>'pressure'::text as pressure,
	data::json->>'humidity'::text as humidity,
	data::json->>'temperature'::text as temperature,
	gw_time as data_time
from telemetry
	where gw_time>$timestamp
	order by gw_time desc
	limit 100

name: Process Telemetry
Prepare Telemetry
processLastWeather
processLastPlant
Prepare Alert
Alerts Query Building
template:
select edge_time as data_time,device_type,device,message from alert
where edge_time > $timestamp
order by edge_time desc
limit 20

name: Process Alerts
css
css
Prepare Status
Status Query Building
template:
select
    a.device, a.status,a.device_type, a.edge_time
from
    status a
    inner join 
        (select device, max(id) as maxid from status 
        group by device) as b on
        a.id = b.maxid
